00009 
00010 #include <map>
00011 
00012 namespace amop
00013 {
00014     namespace Detail
00015     {        
00016         class TVirtualTable;
00017         class TDynamicFunction;        
00018         
00019         //------------------------------------------------------------------
00020         class TDynamicObject : public Detail::TObjectHolder
00021         {
00022         public:
00023             TDynamicObject();
00024             ~TDynamicObject();
00025 
00026             void* GetVptr();
00027             
00028             template <class F>
00029             TDynamicFunction* Bind(F method)
00030             {
00031                 size_t offset = Detail::Inner::TCheckOffset::GetOffset(method);
00032 
00033                 return _BindFunction(offset, Detail::CallHandler::Create<F>(offset));
00034             }
00035 
00036             template <class T>
00037             TDynamicFunction*  BindDestructor()
00038             {
00039                 typedef void (T::*TDestructorType)(void*);
00040                 
00041                 size_t offset = Detail::Inner::TCheckOffset::GetOffsetDestructor<T>();
00042 
00043                 return _BindFunction(offset, Detail::CallHandler::Create<TDestructorType>(offset));
00044             }            
00045 
00046         public:
00047             // Inheritent from TObjectHolder        
00048             any& GetRedirect(size_t idx);
00049             any& GetReturn(size_t idx);
00050             void SetActual(size_t idx, size_t paramId, const any& param);
00051             void AddCallCounter(size_t idx);
00052 
00053             TDynamicFunction* _BindFunction(size_t offset, TFunctionAddress data);
00054             
00055             typedef std::map<size_t, TDynamicFunction*> TDynamicFunctionMap;
00056 
00057             Detail::TVirtualTable* mVirtualTable;       
00058             TDynamicFunctionMap mFunctions;            
00059         };
00060     }
00061 }
00062 
00063 #endif //__AMOP_DYNAMICOBJECT_HH
